Posts.Content: Aug 4, 2009 11:13AM LynnieM wrote: Hi Marie, I have my stereostatic biopsy tomorrow -- thanks for the information on your experience.  The waiting is so exhausting.  I do alot of "stinking thinking."  Will be thinking of you and hopefully this will be returned.
Posts.Title: Had Core Biopsy And Waiting ladi553 mommyalways

Posts.Content: Aug 5, 2009 09:38AM LynnieM wrote: Angela, Today is my day -- got a good nights rest.  I did share with certain individuals at work -- some positive and some negative (Heard their horror stories).  My attitude is:  It is, what it is!!!  I have been dealing with cysts for twenty years (always aspirated).  When the surgeon told me I had two, possibility three hard nodules I went totally numb.  I thought my day couldn't get worse then that -- went out to my car -- received a $5 parking ticket outside the breast surgeons office and was flipped off on my way home.  I traveled to my office and sat in the parking lot and starting laughing.  I shared this day with my co-workers -- I guess two other people were having a bad day too!!!!! Will be thinking about you tomorrow Take care,
Posts.Title: Had Core Biopsy And Waiting ladi553 mommyalways

Posts.Content: Aug 6, 2009 12:01PM LynnieM wrote: Great news ladi553!! Well had my biopsy yesterday -- all went well!  Advice ICE, ICE LADIES!!! My husband was a great support for me yesterday -- he took great care of me (okay, I might of took alittle advantage of the situation).  My boss told me not to come to work today -- called him  this morning (male), he has been really concerned -- had me laughing on the phone.  I told my husband that the machine they use first had me concerned, but the numbing meds were greatly appreciated -- all I felt was pressure.  The female rad had trouble getting through the tissue and kept apolozing -- but got sample.  Watched the whole procedure on the screen, which to me was a comfort.  The second hard nodule turned out to be a blood filled cyct.  I left yesterday with the feeling it is going to be okay, no matter what!!!!!
Posts.Title: Had Core Biopsy And Waiting ladi553 mommyalways

Posts.Content: Aug 10, 2009 08:22AM LynnieM wrote: Good morning Ladies!!! Received call from surgeon yesterday.  She stated that she was in her office doing paperwork and wanted me to know that my results were "B9." I want to take this opportunity to thank all you wonderful ladies for your support.  I will be checking back time to time to see how everyone is doing. Take care, ((((((((hugs)))))) LynnieM
